title: What's open and closed on Martin Luther King Jr. Day
full_text: What's open and closed on Martin Luther King Jr. Day. Government offices, the stock market and many schools are closed Monday in observance of the Martin Luther King Jr. Day, but most businesses are open. Government offices, the stock market and many schools are closed Monday in observance of Martin Luther King Jr. Day, but most businesses are open.
